Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I reliably screen or block callers on a number-by-number basis?  I've been getting calls from a strange number recently, and it's not even a local area call. This caller has called me 20 times, and whenever I pick up the phone I am met with intimidating silence, even if I shout in it.Naturally, I decided that I had enough, and tried to surf the internet finding ways to block certain phone number. However, the only methods I found were to either:(1) Call your call service company to block a call,(2) Install some apps to do it,Now, I do not want to overcomplicate this situation, and I've had bad experiences with applications... so, any suggestions on how to deal with this?
Title: How can I automatically reject some types of calls?

history.Text: Starting at Tuesday, 25th of October, The strnage number 7275567300 kept on calling me for some reason, and its not even local area call. Its 30th today, and this caller has called me 20 times. Now, whenever I pick up the phone, I am responded with intimidating silence, even if I shout in it.Natrually, I decided that I had enough, and tried to surf the internet finding ways to block certain phone number. Howeve, only ones I ever found were to either:(1) Call your call service company to block a call,(2) Install some apps for it,(3) etc.Now, I do not want to overcomplicate this situation, and I had bad memories with applications... so, any suggestions to deal with this?P.S. I searched the phone number, and this came up:727-556-7300Line Type: LandlinePhone Carrier: Verizon Florida Inc.City: Saint PetersburgState: FLCounty: PinellasLatitude: 27.8800Longitude: -82.6800Apparently its some doucebag in Florida who is constantly calling me...
How to automatically reject some types of calls?

I've been getting calls from a strange number recently, and it's not even a local area call. This caller has called me 20 times, and whenever I pick up the phone I am met with intimidating silence, even if I shout in it.Naturally, I decided that I had enough, and tried to surf the internet finding ways to block certain phone number.
